github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: Use TypeScript and follow the Airbnb style guide for all generated code.
Follow strict type checking with proper interfaces and type safety.
Reference memory bank files and maintain dependency tracking in dependencies.md.

github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Follow the Conventional Commits format (feat:, fix:, docs:, refactor:, test:, chore:). Keep messages under 72 characters.
Reference related issues and pull requests when applicable.

github.copilot.chat.pullRequestDescripti.text: Start with a concise summary. List key changes as bullet points. Reference related issues and include breaking changes if any.
Include testing instructions and deployment considerations.

github.copilot.chat.reviewSelection.inst.text: Check for modularity, proper TypeScript types, comprehensive error handling, and code comments.
Verify compliance with project coding standards and memory bank guidelines.
Ensure no direct mutations of shared state and proper dependency management.

github.copilot.chat.testGeneration.instr.text: Write tests using Jest with TypeScript. Ensure each function has both positive and negative test cases.
Include unit tests, integration tests, and edge case coverage.
Follow the testing patterns documented in the project's memory bank.
